description: Enable AI agents to store, search, and delete persistent memories across sessions to enhance context retention and recall. Integrate seamlessly with Mem0.ai's cloud or self-hosted Supabase storage for scalable and reliable memory management. Optimize your LLM applications with advanced filtering, semantic search, and flexible storage modes tailored to your needs.

mem0ApiKey.description: API key for Mem0 cloud storage mode

defaultAppId.description: Default app ID for project scoping

defaultUserId.description: Default user ID for memory operations

defaultAgentId.description: Default agent ID for identifying the LLM/agent

tools.name: add_memory
tools.description: Stores a piece of text as a memory in Mem0.

appId.description: Optional app ID - application identifier (legacy parameter). If not provided, uses DEFAULT_APP_ID environment variable.

infer.description: Optional whether to infer memories or directly store messages (default: true, for cloud API).

orgId.description: Optional organization ID - for mem0 organization-level management. If not provided, uses DEFAULT_ORG_ID environment variable.

userId.description: User ID to associate with the memory. If not provided, uses DEFAULT_USER_ID environment variable.

agentId.description: Optional agent ID - identifies the LLM/agent making the tool call. If not provided, uses DEFAULT_AGENT_ID environment variable.

content.description: The text content to store as memory.

excludes.description: Optional specific preferences to exclude from the memory (for cloud API).

includes.description: Optional specific preferences to include in the memory (for cloud API).

immutable.description: Optional whether the memory is immutable (default: false, for cloud API).

projectId.description: Optional project ID - for mem0 Pro plan project organization (e.g., proj_ABC123). If not provided, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT_ID environment variable.

sessionId.description: Optional session ID to associate with the memory.

outputFormat.description: Optional format version, either v1.0 (deprecated) or v1.1 (recommended, for cloud API).

expirationDate.description: Optional when the memory will expire (format: YYYY-MM-DD, for cloud API).

customCategories.description: Optional list of categories with names and descriptions (for cloud API).

customInstructions.description: Optional project-specific guidelines for handling and organizing memories (for cloud API).

tools.name: search_memory
tools.description: Searches stored memories in Mem0 based on a query.

topK.description: Optional number of top results to return (default: 10, for cloud API).

appId.description: Optional app ID - application identifier (legacy parameter). If not provided, uses DEFAULT_APP_ID environment variable.

orgId.description: Optional organization ID - for mem0 organization-level management. If not provided, uses DEFAULT_ORG_ID environment variable.

fields.description: Optional specific fields to include in the response (for cloud API).

rerank.description: Optional whether to rerank the memories (default: false, for cloud API).

userId.description: User ID to filter search. If not provided, uses DEFAULT_USER_ID environment variable.

agentId.description: Optional agent ID - identifies the LLM/agent making the tool call. If not provided, uses DEFAULT_AGENT_ID environment variable.

projectId.description: Optional project ID - for mem0 Pro plan project organization (e.g., proj_ABC123). If not provided, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT_ID environment variable.

sessionId.description: Optional session ID to filter search.

threshold.description: Optional similarity threshold for results (for cloud API).

keywordSearch.description: Optional whether to search based on keywords (default: false, for cloud API).

filterMemories.description: Optional whether to filter the memories (default: false, for cloud API).

tools.name: delete_memory
tools.description: Deletes a specific memory by ID from Mem0.

appId.description: Optional app ID - application identifier (legacy parameter). If not provided, uses DEFAULT_APP_ID environment variable.

orgId.description: Optional organization ID - for mem0 organization-level management. If not provided, uses DEFAULT_ORG_ID environment variable.

userId.description: User ID associated with the memory. If not provided, uses DEFAULT_USER_ID environment variable.

agentId.description: Optional agent ID - identifies the LLM/agent making the tool call. If not provided, uses DEFAULT_AGENT_ID environment variable.

memoryId.description: The unique ID of the memory to delete.

projectId.description: Optional project ID - for mem0 Pro plan project organization (e.g., proj_ABC123). If not provided, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT_ID environment variable.
